name: Basic Plan
description: Ideal for individuals who want to stay fit with essential gym access.
features: Access to gym facilities during regular hours

name: Premium Plan
description: Perfect for individuals who want additional perks and flexibility.
features: Unlimited use of all gym equipment
3 Free personal training sessions per month
Access to sauna and steam room

name: Family Plan
description: Great for families who want to stay healthy together.
features: 2 adults and up to 2 children included
Free personal training sessions for each adult
Free access to family wellness events
